summary: Filmmaker William Greaves auditioned acting students for a fictional drama, while simultaneously shooting the behind-the-scenes drama taking place.
cast: Patricia Ree Gilbert|Don Fellows|Jonathan Gordon|Bob Rosen|William Greaves|Susan Anspach|Audrey Heningham|Stevan Larner|Terence Macartney-Filgate|Maria Zeheri
keywords: experimental film|avant garde|film within a film|national film registry|park
title: Symbiopsychotaxiplasm: Take One
